mapper.insert: MERGE INTO BALANCE_SHEET USING DUAL ON(ITEM_ID = #{itemId} AND REPORTING_YEAR = #{reportingYear} AND REPORT_CODE = #{reportCode}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( ID, ITEM_ID, REPORTING_YEAR, REPORT_CODE, FS_NM, REVENUE, OPERATING_INCOME, NET_INCOME, ASSET, DEBT, EQUITY, CURRENT_ASSET, TOTAL_NON_CURRENT_ASSET, SHORT_TERM_DEBT, LONG_TERM_DEBT ) VALUES( #{reportingYear}||#{reportCode}||#{itemId}, #{itemId}, #{reportingYear}, #{reportCode}, #{fsNm}, #{revenue}, #{operatingIncome}, #{netIncome}, #{asset}, #{debt}, #{equity}, #{currentAsset}, #{totalNonCurrentAsset}, #{shortTermDebt}, #{longTermDebt} )
